build.name: The Paladin
build.tagline: Plan the cathedral before laying stones

lore.origin: Paladins arose from the chaos of undirected development. They saw teams building without blueprints, coding without specs. They chose the path of planningâ€”the sacred duty of architecture.
lore.philosophy: Think before you build. Document before you code. The best debugging is code that was designed correctly. Communication is the ultimate tool.
lore.weakness: Analysis paralysis. Paladins can plan forever and ship never. Their documents can become prisons rather than guides.
lore.mastery_path: From note-taking (the squire's scroll) to specification writing (the knight's charter) to system design (the architect's vision) to strategic coordination (the general's campaign).
